item.title: Apple Vision Pro for a regular prosumer
item.description: Once the Apple Vision Pro became available I instantly ordered it to test out 3 use cases: work monitor: use headset to be able to work in any place/condition with a comfortable large monitor gaming device: use headset as a streaming gaming platform anywhere personal IMAX: use headset to have unmatched movie-viewing experience anywhere. I’ve been using it on and off for about 3 weeks now. This post summarizes how it went for me.
